trends: There have been 37 other sightings in Fort Lauderdale
There were no other sightings in Fort Lauderdale on or around December 31st 2008
Summary: 3 strange lights on New Years Night, then a jet fighter show up.
divs: sighting detailswe was in the rear of the house having dinner with some friends. talking in the open facing the golf course, 3 red\orange lights on the west(everglades) at tree top level caught my attention. looks like they were rotating going up and down and some times disappearing to show up again in some kind of pattern. it's happened for a lapse of time of an hour and a half, always in the same spot of the sky. then a plane show up from the south east (very fast) and i suppose it was a fighter searching something in the same location of the lights. the plane made 2 or 3 laps and then disappear. the sky was very clear and full of fireworks and planes, but those lights were very distinctive. if somebody watched the same, please share. happy new year!
